thread.section_title: Travel: late deals & bargains, holiday news and advice - Mirror Online
thread.title: Holiday deals of the week: Bargain sunshine, Lapland, ski, European city and UK breaks
thread.title_full: Holiday deals of the week: Bargain sunshine, Lapland, ski, European city and UK breaks - Mirror Online

author: Stacey Quinton
title: Holiday deals of the week: Bargain sunshine, Lapland, ski, European city and UK breaks
text:
UNDER £150
Wales from £75pp:
The four-star St. George’s hotel in Llandudno has been named AA Hotel of the Year for Wales 2015-16 and is celebrating with the launch of the Arrive and Revive package which includes a two course dinner in the Terrace Restaurant overlooking Llandudno Bay plus full Welsh breakfast.
Yorkshire Spa from £87pp:
Celebrate National Spa Week from November 2 – 6 with a stay at the four-star Bridge Hotel and Spa in Wetherby. This package includes one night on November 2, breakfast, dinner and a complimentary 30 minute spa treatment. 0800 042 0288
UNDER £300
Lanzarote from £250pp:
Relax with seven nights self catering at the four-star THB Tropical Island in Playa Blanca including flights from Bristol on October 31. easyjet.com/holidays , 020 3499 5232
Ski Bulgaria from £279pp:
Book now to secure a seven night ski break at the four-star Murite Club Hotel on an all-inclusive basis. The price includes return flights from Gatwick departing January 9. 0800 083 4000
UNDER £500
Florence from £449pp:
Flit away for four nights for the price of three in Florence staying B&B at the four-star Grand Baglioni. The offer includes return international flights from Gatwick with EasyJet on October 30. 01293 731 753
Lapland from £449pp:
Make your winter wonderland dreams come true with seven nights half board at the four-star Crazy Reindeer Hotel in Levi and save £210pp. Price includes flights from Bristol on January 2. 01483 791 114
UNDER £1,000
Kuala Lumpur from £559pp:
Book by October 22 to enjoy four nights, including breakfast at the three-star Swiss Inn Chinatown Kuala Lumpur with flights from Heathrow traveling on selected dates in November.
Mexico from £616.94pp:
Chill out in Cancun with seven nights at the four-star Oh By Oasis Hotel, a boutique adult only hotel. Fly from Gatwick with Thomas Cook Airlines on November 12, price includes breakfast.
Cape Town from £777pp:
Book a seven night room only stay at the four-star Protea Hotel President in Cape Town with flights from Heathrow on November 16. lowcostholidays.com , 0800 2800212
Travel editor's star buy
Bali from £648pp:
Discover Bali on this one week bed and breakfast holiday staying at the four-star Flamingo Dewata Hotel. Price includes return flights from Heathrow on October 27. 0208 7050086
DailyMirror
